attributes.action: Introduce Amsterdam style "coffeeshops" and tax and regulate cannabis accordingly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People will always find a way to smoke Cannabis, remove the drug dealer out of the equation and tax and regulate cannabis accordingly, thus removing the dangers involved with using drug dealers, and vastly increasing tax revenue.
Smokers will also cause less hassle than drinkers.
